lead_paragraph: Rosen fails to discern between racists and those of us who just want to think critically about Middle Eastern politics, be free to discuss events in Israel and the Palestinian territories and perhaps propose changes that would be more just and compassionate for all involved without being unfairly judged anti-Semitic. My American Jewish friends whisper to me that even they cannot question Zionism to other Jews without being labeled anti-Semitic. Did the horrors of World War II take out our common sense, too? Amy Logan Laguna Beach, Calif.
abstract: Amy Logan letter comments on Jonathan Rosen's Nov 4 article on anti-Semitism and demonization of Israel in wake of Sept 11 terrorist attacks
